channel.title: JAD from SRL forums
channel.description: Hi. this is JAD from SRL-forums. you may know me for helping a few people there, writing a few tutorials and being active in there community. The reason I haven't really been active in this community is because the user name JAD was taken and that bugged me lol. I looked at the members list and JAD (the fraud) didn't even take the quiz to be able to post yet. I was wondering, could a mod or admin (if your allowed to) possibly delete that account so I can register as that? It'd be awesome if you could :) thanks.

item.title: JAD from SRL forums
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

[quote=“dudeofthed, post:4, topic:75582”][quote author=Bebemycat2 link=topic=110994.msg1105517#msg1105517 date=1175919836]
Welcome.

For the name thing, you should pm either Moparisthebest or Starblaster100.
[/quote]

yes, and instead of signing up again you could ask to get a name change like Wonderguy6 did. His new name is Doc. Booty (Wonderguy6).[/quote]
WTFRUSAYINNUB!

Read full topic

item.title: JAD from SRL forums
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:9, topic:75582”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=110994.msg1119199#msg1119199 date=1176074685]

pm’d mopar 2 days ago… hasn’t responded.

If mopar was a program, waiting would be something like this = “Wait(StandardWaitTime * Tasks.HowManyToDo * Lazyness);”.
[/quote]With the addition of lazyness. Generally his task amount is low :p[/quote]

That too.

Read full topic
